receiptStandards.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.

receiptStandards.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.

receiptStandards.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications, Shipping, Training
receiptStandards.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP COMPANY LIMITED, CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.

receiptStandards.expense_type: Hotel, Flight, Train, Restaurant, Taxi, Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications, Shipping, Training

receiptStandards.rule: Company Tax ID: 0105560119091 should appear on supporting documents

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.expense_type: Office supplies, Software, Equipment, Telecommunications, Shipping, Training
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Business expenses related to workers completing their job will usually be tax exempt. Only purely business related elements of an expense will be tax free

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: If expenses are reimbursed as normal against receipts and invoices (with the Local Employers details) then these will be tax exempt for both domestic and international business travel

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: There are no set government per diem rates and any fixed lump sum allowance given will be taxable for both domestic and international travel

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Reimbursement of mileage, fuel, parking and car expenses are done at the discretion of each employer. To be tax exempt workers must submit a travelling report approved by their manager

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Only purely business related elements of an expense will be tax free, anything additional will be subject to tax

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Tax exemptions will only be applied providing sufficient proof is shared e.g. tax receipts, invoices etc, with the Local Partners details on the supporting documents

compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.icp_name: AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesGrossUpRelated.gross_up_rule: Expenses for spouses, partners, and other family members. Personal expenses (any non-business-related expenses). Any casual emolument or benefit attached to an office or position in addition to salary or wages (e.g., salary of house help, gas, water, or electricity bills, school fees, personal travel)

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Establish clear business purpose of all incurred expenses

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Submit expense claims with clear and legible copies of receipts to Client line manager for approval preferably within the same month of the expense

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Client line manager review and approval required - ensure expenses have all correct and needed information and clear business purpose

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Share with GoGlobal the approved expenses per worker before the payroll cut off date to process them in the same month

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expense submission must have itemized report along with clear receipts

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Receipts must be properly labeled for identification

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Correct categorization of the incurred expense required

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Any personal information not required for reimbursement purposes should be removed before submission

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: GoGlobal validates receipts according to local regulations and follows up on missing or questionable receipts, postpones or rejects reimbursements if required for compliance and taxability

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Convert amount in local currency and include currency & exchange rate used for foreign currency expenses

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: For mileage reimbursements, include To and Fro locations, distance travelled and per diem rates

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Travelling report approved by manager required for tax exemption

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Where a particular receipt must state the workers name e.g. internet or mobile bill, the Local Employer will request in writing to the worker that they submit a petty cash form with the original receipts copy for reference

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Familiarize worker on how to report expenses through Expensify or manual expense report (to be agreed between worker and manager)

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Determine internal process and expense policy including method and deadline for submitting expense claims to Line Manager

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses approved after payroll cutoff date are processed in the following month

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Expenses submitted without itemized reports or properly labeled receipts will be rejected or postponed

compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.icp_name: GoGlobal, AYP HR GROUP CO.,LTD, RJ Supply and Service Co., Ltd.
compliancePoliciesAdditionalInfoRelated.additional_info_rule: Online copies are sufficient, hard copy is not required
